recipesJson.name: Creamy Caramel Custard
recipesJson.author: ThirdWorldOrder
recipesJson.description: This will please most caramel fans. If you don't have Candy Caramel, just leave it out. Give this juice at least a week to take proper form.

reviews.text: Love it! Great adv! I've been trying to break into more than just fruit flavors and this did the trick! Both my husband and I love this!
This mix is amazing, I mixed a 20ml tester to try out and after a week steep I made a 240ml. It's been my adv for a few weeks now. Thanks for sharing!
